text.tspan: Political regime classification by source, Chile
The classifications are normalized to range from 0 to 1. The number of available sources differs by country or

g.text: Regimes of the WorldRegimes of the World

text.tspan: Data source: Lhrmann et al. (2018); Skaaning et al. (2015); Boix et al. (2013); Polity; Freedom House; BTI; EIU
